Issue.creator: davidkel
Issue.summary: Have a test suite that utilises HSM backed by softhsm as the HSM provider
Issue.description: The node-sdk doc says that there is experimental HSM support and how to enable it for testing. This task is to go back and change the doc to say HSM is not experimental now, and to have proper unit and integration tests of the HSM support which run as part of the build verify process.
